SEARCH
Package com.github.utils.src.main

Class DateUtils

java.lang.Object
com.github.utils.src.main.DateUtils
public class DateUtils extends Object
Utility class providing various date and time related methods. Methods include getting the current date/time, formatting and parsing dates, calculating the difference between dates, adding/subtracting time units, and more.

      public static String formatDate(LocalDateTime date, String pattern)
      Formats a given LocalDateTime object into a string based on the provided pattern.
      Parameters:
      date - The LocalDateTime object to be formatted.
      pattern - The pattern to format the date (e.g., "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss").
      Returns:
      The formatted date string.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the date is null or pattern is invalid

    • toUnixTimestamp

      public static long toUnixTimestamp(LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Converts a LocalDateTime object to its equivalent UNIX timestamp (seconds since epoch).
      Parameters:
      dateTime - The LocalDateTime object to convert.
      Returns:
      The UNIX timestamp (seconds since epoch).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the dateTime is null

    • toUnixTimestamp

      public static long toUnixTimestamp(LocalDate date)
      Converts a LocalDate object to its equivalent UNIX timestamp (seconds since epoch). The time is set to the start of day (00:00:00).
      Parameters:
      date - The LocalDate object to convert.
      Returns:
      The UNIX timestamp (seconds since epoch).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the date is null

    • toUnixTimestamp

      public static long toUnixTimestamp(ZonedDateTime dateTime)
      Converts a ZonedDateTime object to its equivalent UNIX timestamp (seconds since epoch).
      Parameters:
      dateTime - The ZonedDateTime object to convert.
      Returns:
      The UNIX timestamp (seconds since epoch).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the dateTime is null

    • fromUnixTimestamp

      public static LocalDateTime fromUnixTimestamp(long timestamp)
      Converts a UNIX timestamp (seconds since epoch) to a LocalDateTime object.
      Parameters:
      timestamp - The UNIX timestamp to convert.
      Returns:
      The LocalDateTime object equivalent to the UNIX timestamp.

    • fromUnixTimestampToLocalDate

      public static LocalDate fromUnixTimestampToLocalDate(long timestamp)
      Converts a UNIX timestamp (seconds since epoch) to a LocalDate object.
      Parameters:
      timestamp - The UNIX timestamp to convert.
      Returns:
      The LocalDate object equivalent to the UNIX timestamp.

    • fromUnixTimestampToZonedDateTime

      public static ZonedDateTime fromUnixTimestampToZonedDateTime(long timestamp, String zoneId)
      Converts a UNIX timestamp (seconds since epoch) to a ZonedDateTime object.
      Parameters:
      timestamp - The UNIX timestamp to convert.
      zoneId - The time zone ID for the resulting ZonedDateTime.
      Returns:
      The ZonedDateTime object equivalent to the UNIX timestamp.

    • isLeapYear

      public static boolean isLeapYear(int year)
      Checks if a given year is a leap year.
      Parameters:
      year - The year to check.
      Returns:
      True if the year is a leap year, false otherwise.

      A LocalDateTime representing the start of the day.

      IllegalArgumentException - if the date is null

    • doDateRangesOverlap

      public static boolean doDateRangesOverlap(LocalDate start1, LocalDate end1, LocalDate start2, LocalDate end2)
      Checks if two date ranges overlap.
      Parameters:
      start1 - Start of first range.
      end1 - End of first range.
      start2 - Start of second range.
      end2 - End of second range.
      Returns:
      True if the ranges overlap, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the dates are null

    • getDatesBetween

      public static List<LocalDate> getDatesBetween(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Creates a list of dates between start and end dates inclusive.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date.
      endDate - The end date.
      Returns:
      A list of dates between start and end inclusive.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either date is null or endDate is before startDate
